root: ^(Log: Enter the drawing interface from DAY1_Map_1)
^(First of all, I should decide what materials to use...but since I've traded in everything I had, there aren't many choices at the moment.)

c-0: ^I wonder what would you do if the restaurant doesn't have a pencil.

cont0: ^Can I move? Will it bother your performance? What if take this as an excuse of drawing a terrible picture…
^All right, I know this. That's what you call an abstract art don't you?
^(Once I start to draw, I need to concentrate and observe my subject. But more than that...)
^(I need to know about the subject. If any observation pops up, I'll collect it for the drawing. )
^Huh? About me? If this could contribute to a better drawing I'd cooperate. What little secret do you want to know about?
^As I like? Or do you mean - WHO I like? I can see what you want to hear, but you are wrong, I will not waste time on women like some somebody did.
^(...Somebody? Who is he talking about? There's something underneath his smile. ) Keep going.
^All I love is human knowledge, endless and eternal.
^Just Kidding! Just guess, What would I do if I can't sleep?
^(Let me think... What would he do if he can't sleep?) --Submit idea to drawing when ready--

c-0: ^Get a mirror and see what your expression is like. You got to be thinking about woman.
c-1: ^I guess you might be reading? ...Don't tell me that you're reading about astrology and magic...

cont1: ^NO-NO-NO, Painter, You don't know what I am deep inside. I would be counting sheeps. I count to sleep every night and when I wake up, the counting still continues! Do you know how many sheeps you can count in one night?

^Have you played the game 'count to 7'? The point is that you can not count 7. But of course 8 doesn't come after 6, so whenever reaching that number I have to start again. We kept counting and kept losing, when the night is over I still can't count to 7.

c-0: ^(Did he just say "We"?) Wait, who are you playing with?
^You sleep with your brothers? You didn't tell me you have a brother.
c-1: ^Counting sheeps is not equal to count to 7. Why don't you just say 7?

cont2: ^It's not that I don't want to, it's that I can't.
^Children are not born to be able to count. The action counting in your head requires the understanding of an abstract concept that repeats over time. It's complex! And difficult!
^Counting 7 means amnesia, counting 7 means disappearing...and then - dangdang~ You start over again.
^I didn't know that counting to 7 is your limit of mathmathematical ability.
^It's something in this world you can never reach. Painter, do you know why?

c-0: ^(Eighminus Tue... 8-2... He wanted to be 7 but reducing was overdone. He went pass 7. )
^Is it because your name sounds like Eight minus two?
c-1: ^(A name decides nothing. Having a name like this doesn't mean that he is good at math of anything. )
^So this is because of your... ADHD?
^Hey Painter! You are a better person than this!
